1554153668450172934.full_text: @kamilkazani This is the part of Russian life that is utterly disgusting - and pervasive. You’re talking with a seemingly liberal and europeanised person, and they just let slip something like черножопый or чурка… 🚩🚩🚩

1554133514404208644.full_text: That's a big topic in large Russian cities and indeed the battles are being fought over it. This complaint from a probably Azeri potential renter and the response of Avito website may be illustrative of it https://t.co/BBymzy02qx

1554145167711641600.full_text: White vs Black dichotomy largely shapes the public consciousness and the internal discourse in Russia. Much of the right wing criticism of Putin is that he is too soft on Blacks. By the way, did you notice you never see a discussion about the criticism of Putin *from the right*?

1554139876932583431.full_text:
If "Slavs" or people of "Slavic appearance" form the most privileged group in Russia, getting a preferential access to jobs, accommodation, career, etc, then who would occupy the lowest places?

The "Blacks". NB: "Blacks" are not Africans, those are "Negroes" https://t.co/SnCwZrKjAl

1554162269092708352.full_text: @kamilkazani I would like to ad my personal experience searching for a flat to rent in Moscow. I'm portuguese and married to a Russian woman. We went to see a lot of flats only for slavs. All the owners wanted to rent the flat to us because I'm european.

1554136243553947648.full_text:
Interestingly enough, the largest real estate website ЦИАН prohibited "only for Slavs" adverts in early 2022. Why?

To place an IPO at the New York Stock Exchange. They introduced measures against the ethnic discrimination, just to abide by the rules of the US capitalists https://t.co/IQFnD9xXBl

1554142615414734854.full_text:
"Black" is a synonym of a "wetback": the dark skinned underclass on the bottom of social ladder

I would recommend you to watch the Ravshan and Jamshut episodes here, as a crash course into the Russian ethnic hierarchy. They are the epitome of Blackness 

https://t.co/pqXet0FkDe https://t.co/vBPmv49UAr

1554399571844820992.full_text: @sportinbookworm @kamilkazani Liberal and Europeanised are not synonymous. Anti immigrant sentiment, which is really plain old racism, is pretty mainstream in all of Europe. And I do mean ALL of Europe. US, despite everything, still treats is immigrants comparatively better.

1554143791686328322.full_text: While the Blackness has social and anthropological overtones: the dark skinned underclass from the South working on poorly paid manual jobs, it has a purely religious aspect, too. Generally speaking, Christianity kinda whitens you, while Islam makes you very much more Black https://t.co/6CkqJ4q9PY

1554162983466672129.full_text: @kamilkazani And it would be interesting if you can explain their addiction to European standards of quality. It's often, for example, to call "euro style construction/reconstruction" when they want to convince people that it's something made with high quality materials.

1554160319890501633.full_text: @kamilkazani I wonder, then, how Shoigu and Kadyrov get to hold visible positions of power.

1554144455585841153.full_text:
This is reflected in memes, too. Consider this photo of Kadyrov with the Fourteen Words - the white nationalist slogan.

That looks very funny. The joke is that:

1) they may seem to be white
2) while in fact, they're 100% Black

Islam makes you Black and Chechens are super Black https://t.co/KXUfk8OID4

1554195260749889542.full_text: @kamilkazani Excellent illustration of the Russian expression "Pull the owl on the globe"

1554140841207291904.full_text:
Interestingly enough, while in the English language, the N. word is offensive and the Black sounds neutral, in Russian it may be the other way around. "Negro" word may be neutral, while "Black" (черный) is always very offensive and dehumanising

These guys are obviously "Black" https://t.co/eIMNwDFifn

1554139308566757378.full_text:
Russian realities may look rather absurd for a Westerner. Here you see the Jewish Museum and Center for Tolerance in Moscow advert. They are looking for a bartender of "Slavic appearance"

Very tolerant, indeed. A worker doesn't need to be Slavic, just look Slavic. That's enough https://t.co/GmDI9FMMxC

1554146103292993536.full_text: Narrative on Russia is controlled by the media establishment of Moscow. And this media establishment is too invested into the alliance with the far right, who are advocating for a new crusade on Blackness. I'll elaborate it in my material on the "liberal" opposition. The end https://t.co/bC9YaM1r0C

1554136827292000258.full_text: "Only for Slavs" adverts should be interpreted situationally, within the cultural context. Poles may be easily excluded. This Polish guy was surprised to find out that he doesn't satisfy the "Only for Slavs" requirement https://t.co/tKMc3a6aiq

1554146977205600256.full_text: @martinlentink Hi, please find the unroll here: https://t.co/H4hVXxLp7D Share this if you think it's interesting. 🤖
